name: Crossed Out
description: '''Crossed Out''' was a [[powerviolence]] band from [[Encinitas, California]]. The band was active from early 1990 until late 1993. The group is considered to be a very important band that helped define powerviolence with a style that incorporated political lyrics, blast beats, and quick tempos. They have been named as the "dark lords of powerviolence" by Beau Beasley of [[Insect Warfare]].
